body.name: BIOSSANCE Squalane and Omega Repair Moisturizer. Rich Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid and Ceramides to Hydrate, Plump and Smooth Skin. Nourish and Improve Fine Lines 1.6 ounces

climatePledgeFriendly.details: EWG Verified products are reviewed to ensure they are free from EWG’s known chemicals of concern and adhere to strict health standards.

features: Biossance Squalane + Omega Repair Cream. A whipped texture moisturizer, rich in lipids and ceramides, to exceptionally hydrate, plump and smooth all skin types. It deeply nourishes without feeling greasy.

Boost Radiance for Dewy, Glowing Skin. Multi-lipids mimic and support skin's natural moisture barrier for healthy-looking skin without adding shine. The decadent repair cream smooths rough texture and crepiness.
Made with Safe and Effective Ingredients. Hyaluronic Acid and squalane provide deep hydration. Omega fatty acids plump and restore while ceramides help maintain and prevent moisture loss.

Part of Your Daily Nontoxic Skincare Routine. Every morning and evening after applying eye products, serums and treatments, gently smooth a thin layer on your face, neck and chest. Enjoy smoother, softer and more supple skin.

Committed to Clean Beauty. As part of Biossance's commitment to high standards for your skin and the environment, all products are vegan, cruelty free and made without paraben or synthetic fragrances or PEG.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #45,491 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #1,081 in Face Moisturizers #1,526 in Climate Pledge Friendly: Beauty

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Whoa! Redness? GONE!
reviews.reviewText: I thought it was some odd fluke but nope, it is this cream! I have Lupus and other autoimmune so my face is always especially ruddy/red- lower cheeks in particular. I slather this on morning and evening & the whole next day the redness is a good 80% (now I would say 95% after six mths) reduced! LOVE this. A new staple for sure! 💕If there is a smell- somehow I ignore it or don’t notice it, or like it- Idk— does not phase me, clearly! For reference, I’m 45- & have very sensitive, thin, breakout prone/super red skin!Update— there is a smell. Took me a bit to notice it due to sinus/allergy issues. It does have a slightly dirty sock smell. But it fades w/in seconds and is Not a deal breaker at all. Could be if you’re pregnant though… 😂

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the instant gratification upon using it. The results go beyond my expectations

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love love love
reviews.reviewText: This saved my winter skin and taught me how amazing niacinamide is for all skin types! Helped smooth out my texture, brighten my complexion and calm redness! Give it a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Don't Worry About "the smell"
reviews.reviewText: A few reviewers commented about the awful smell. I went ahead and bought it anyway, and of course I had to smell it right away! Honestly, I had to try really hard, and mean really suck air in my nose to see what the fuss was about. It is so faint, hardly noticeable at all. After application, no smell at all. I've only used it 3 days now and already see a difference. I'll probably add the fifth star when I come back to update my review. Give it a try, y'all!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally! Something that works!
reviews.reviewText: I'm a 46 yo woman and in the last 10 years I developed rosacea. My cheeks are not only red, but I also have scaley, dry patches that NO moisturizer can tackle, and now that the cold weather is here, it's even worse. I could still feel the dry patches on my cheeks even after completing my skin care routine.I've heard good things about squalane, so I decided to try this and WOW. I dabbed a little on my face (you don't need much) and the dryness went away immediately. It's been a few hours and my face is still moisturized. The interesting thing is the creme isnt heavy and thick at all, but it moisturizes like a heavy creme. Its very light.If you have very dry skin try it! I'm very happy with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works well, but the smell is awful
reviews.reviewText: I tried to get used to its smell, but ended up throwing it away unfortunately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Favorite Favorite Lotion!
reviews.reviewText: Oof! This has been my favorite face lotion for a few years now. I love it so much. So light and hydrating!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You will not regret this purchase!
reviews.reviewText: A makeup artist at Sephora, used this on my face. I was instantly hooked, it quenched my dry face. It smells earthy as it should. I got better deals and free gifts on the products website.

reviews.reviewTitle: Ótimo por ser 100% natural, mas minha pela ficou extremamente oleosa!
reviews.reviewText: Deve ser ótimo para quem tem pele seca / extremamente seca ou talvez até normal. A minha é normal p/ mista e ficou extremamente oleosa, ao ponto de escorrer da testa para os olhos.Porém estão de parabéns por abraçarem causas naturais, defender os tubarões e a Mãe Terra!

Since I’ve purchased this product I will never chose another face cream. It makes my skin feel amazing. I’ve only been using it 6 months but I recommend it. Has a bit of an odd fragrance. But not too bad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Caused face redness, swelling and itching
reviews.reviewText: I bought 3 face creans and seruns from Biossance for the first time.They caused a nasty reaction, redness, swelling and itching in my face.I stopped using, got better after 2 days and then tried again and same reaction.I thought of warning others who might be sensitive to some ingredients in this products.Will certainly not be using this brand ever again.
